content:
TITLE: Creating New API Specification
DESCRIPTION: Command to create and deploy a new API specification to the readme platform, which will create a new page and associate an ID with the spec.
SOURCE: https://github.com/alchemyplatform/docs-openapi-specs/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run create transact/newspec.yaml
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating Existing API Specification
DESCRIPTION: Command to update an existing API specification that has a x-readme.id field set.
SOURCE: https://github.com/alchemyplatform/docs-openapi-specs/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run update spec.yml
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing and Using swagger-parser for OpenAPI Specs
DESCRIPTION: Instructions for navigating to the parser directory and using the recommended @apidevtools/swagger-parser library for processing OpenAPI specifications.
SOURCE: https://github.com/alchemyplatform/docs-openapi-specs/blob/main/parser/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
1. cd in parser directory
2. use @apidevtools/swagger-parser!
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Spectral Linting
DESCRIPTION: Command to manually run Spectral linting on an API specification file to ensure it adheres to defined rules.
SOURCE: https://github.com/alchemyplatform/docs-openapi-specs/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npx spectral lint spec.yaml
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Development Dependencies
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the required npm dependencies for working with the documentation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/alchemyplatform/docs-openapi-specs/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm i
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating Environment Configuration
DESCRIPTION: Command to copy the template environment configuration file to create a new .env file for local development.
SOURCE: https://github.com/alchemyplatform/docs-openapi-specs/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
cp .env.template .env
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Cloning the Alchemy Docs Repository
DESCRIPTION: Command to clone the Alchemy docs OpenAPI specifications repository to your local machine.
SOURCE: https://github.com/alchemyplatform/docs-openapi-specs/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git clone https://github.com/alchemyplatform/docs-openapi-specs
```
